articles.title: Supreme Court Overturns Roe v. Wade: Live Updates
articles.description: Full coverage of the Supreme Court decision to eliminate the constitutional right to an abortion, overruling the 1973 Roe v. Wade decision and leaving the question of abortion’s legality to the states.

articles.title: Ukrainian city of Severodonetsk now 'completely under Russian occupation' after months of fighting
articles.description: The eastern Ukrainian city of Severodonetsk is "completely under Russian occupation," the city's head of military administration said Saturday, following months of grueling and bloody fighting.
articles.content: The eastern Ukrainian city of Severodonetsk is "completely under Russian occupation," the city's head of military administration said Saturday, following months of grueling and bloody fighting.

articles.author: WRGB Staff
articles.title: Extraordinary session called to craft NY gun safety legislation after Supreme Court ruling
articles.description: NY Gov. Kathy Hochul announced Friday that she will convene an extraordinary session of the state legislature on June 30 to pass new gun safety legislation.
